# Specification

This build honors the Problem, Audience, and Platform from the intake docs by validating each stage before the user can advance.

## Functional Requirements
1. Enforce presence checks for Problem, Audience, Platform, Core Flow, MVP Features.
2. Await at least one design asset in the /designs/ index before approving the design stage.
3. Emit stage approval results as `{ok:true}` when validators pass.

## Technical Notes
- Fastify API routes back the validator endpoints.
- Next.js handles the UI shell.
- SQLite + Drizzle store sessions, docs, and design metadata.

## Definition of Done
- Every stage validator returns ok.
- Docs and design index contain the required content.
- Export manifest can be generated without errors.
